cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("append")

	APPEND("dst", "val")
	APPEND("dst", 1)
	APPEND("dst", 1.5)
	APPEND("dst", true)
	APPEND("dst", false)
	APPEND("dst", []int{
		1, 2, 3, 4,
	}).ALLOW_DUPLICATES(false)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: append
processors:
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_21b68fd2
      field: dst
      value: val
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_b3452fe8
      field: dst
      value: 1
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_c32611cd
      field: dst
      value: 1.5
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_79aa5be5
      field: dst
      value: true
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_9a731bbc
      field: dst
      value: false
  - append:
      tag: append_dst_6a627252
      field: dst
      value:
        - 1
        - 2
        - 3
        - 4
      allow_duplicates: false
